title: Texture Studies
description: This is a study focused on realistic material and surface detailing using 3D texture mapping in Cinema 4D.

title: Lighting Studies
description: This is a study exploring different lighting techniques in Cinema 4D to enhance mood, depth, and visual realism.

title: Cyber City Renders
description: Futuristic cityscapes inspired by cyberpunk aesthetics.

title: Nintendo Game Boy Renders
description: 3D recreation of a classic handheld gaming device modeled, textured, and rendered from scratch using volume builder in Cinema 4D.

title: Miscellaneous Renders
description: A collection of experimental 3D pieces exploring form, material, and composition.

title: Tech Renders
description: Hard-surface modeling practice with various camera angles in Cinema 4D.

title: Plurri Lab
description: End-to-end UX/UI design for a science-focused platform for the Advanced Research Projects Agency for Health. The design focuses on user flows, interface design, and visual identity, and was awarded a Microsoft Civilian Honors Award for its innovation and design.

title: Position Description Generator
description: UX/UI for a dynamic tool that helped the Department of Commerce generate standardized job position descriptions using generative AI and reduce their manual workflow processing time by 96%.

title: Operational Planning Toolkit
description: Interactive gaming simulation toolkit designed to streamline planning and operational workflows.

title: Global Business Navigator
description: UX/UI for a generative AI research platform for the International Trade Administration that enables users to explore international trade regulations.

title: Concept Art
description: Explorative concept art focusing on storytelling, character, and game ideas.

title: Anatomy Studies
description: Figure drawing and anatomical studies aimed at improving structure, proportion, and gesture.

title: Animal Studies
description: A series of animal studies exploring movement, anatomy, and form.

title: Miscellaneous Illustrations
description: A collection of various illustrations exploring style, color, and technique. Plus an illustration of my dog.
